title: The Life of Andrew Jackson
description: The classic one-volume biography of Andrew JacksonRobert V. Remini's prizewinning, three-volume biography, The Life of Andrew Jackson, won the National Book Award upon its completion in 1984. Now, Remini captures the essence of the life and career of the seventh president of the United States in the meticulously crafted single-volume abridgement.
author: Robert V. Remini
